rootCause.context: Users are spending unusually long time on this page
rootCause.contextualData: Extended page view times may indicate users are having trouble finding information or completing actions.
rootCause.conversionImpact: This could be causing increased drop-off rates

recommendedFix.suggestion: Consider reviewing page layout and content organization. Ensure key actions are clearly visible.

insights.impactEstimate: Optimizing this page could reduce average time spent by 40-60% and improve conversion rates
